content: Stephen Flowerday - Faculty Profile Home Faculty Directory Profile Update Your Profile Directory FAQs PACT Login Give Feedback Stephen Flowerday Professor Stephen Flowerday Professor Academic Appointment(s)AdministrationDepartment of Computer & Cyber SciencesSchool of Computer and Cyber SciencesDepartment of Computer & Cyber SciencesAdministrationDepartment of The Graduate School BioStephen Flowerday is a professor of Information Systems at Augusta University. His research interests focus on the management, behavioral, and human aspects of cybersecurity. He has received funding for his work from IBM, THRIP, NRF, SASUF, Erasmus, GMRDC, and others.
